page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT Tees Components.
page.content: This local company occupies space previously used by the North Skelton Iron Mine. (675183) It produces steel fabrications to customers specification and undertakes heavy engineering work requiring specialised machine-tools. Amongst other things it has manufactured parts for use in stabilisers of Type 22 Destroyers. The company is less than 5 years old and employs about 70 people. Its financial turnover for the year 1984/5 was in excess of Â£1M. Local football has benefitted greatly from this firm's sponsorship. It is the largest single employer in the survey area.
